<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_1307894_cmms_model"> <x_1307894_cmms_model action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <aem_approved_date/> <alarms/> <asset_type display_value="Air Dryer (Medical)">3cef346d93314210397dbd6cebba1034</asset_type> <assigned_to/> <classification/> <display_name/> <eol_date/> <identifier/> <internal_notes/> <known_as/> <last_pm_review_date>2023-05-05</last_pm_review_date> <maintenance>Schedules: Monthly, 3 & 6 month, 1 & 3 year Procedures: Monthly Check prefilter cartridge rotate to the offline medical air dryer. Check operating conditions: Inlet flow, inlet pressure, temperature and purge rate Check prefilter and afterfilter Check purifier operating cycle Clean regulator for pneumatic timer Do not allow pressure to exceed 75 psig max.
3 month Replace prefilter cartridges as indicated by color change Check pilot air filter element and clean
6 month * SAT *UNSAT* *_____*_____* CHECK OUTLET DEWPOINT
*_____*_____* BLOW DOWN RELIEF VALVES
1 year Replace COR filter Check desiccant and replace if necessary Inspect and clean solenoid valves, check valves, purge lines, and lubricated plug valves Replace carbon monoxied filter and odor/particle filter
3 year Replace desiccant
Performed by: Scripps tech</maintenance> <maintenance_intervals/> <maintenance_standard>Matches other non-regulatory requirement</maintenance_standard> <maintenance_strategy>Preventive/Scheduled</maintenance_strategy> <manufacturer display_value="Pattons Medical">3af67ced93fd0210397dbd6cebba10a8</manufacturer> <model_name>0701008</model_name> <model_number>0701008</model_number> <network_capability/> <phi_storage/> <picture/> <probability>1</probability> <processed_by/> <proposed_on/> <proposer_reviewed/> <reason_for_no_pm/> <references/> <risk/> <risk_score>8</risk_score> <severity>8</severity> <state>Active</state> <sub_state/> <sys_class_name>x_1307894_cmms_model</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-26 03:24:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bcb3ed2d93f14210397dbd6cebba10e2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 19:51:40</sys_updated_on> <system/> <udi/> <useful_life_yrs/> <website/> </x_1307894_cmms_model> </record_update>
